class Qcircuits.tests.test_core.TestCaseAppended(methodName='runTest')[source]¶

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

Create an instance of the class that will use the named test method when executed. Raises a ValueError if the instance does not have a method with the specified name.

test_transfer_left_right_port_identical()[source]¶

Trivial cases

test_transfer_left_right_port_indentical_inverted()[source]¶

Trivial cases

test_transfer_voltage_divider()[source]¶

Voltage divider, see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Voltage_divider We add an extra resistor between Vin and ground

test_transfer_wheatstone()[source]¶

Wheatstone bridge, see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wheatstone_bridge Note that the correct definitions of the voltages V_G and V_S can be found here: http://www.ece.lsu.edu/ee4770/1999/lsli04.4up.pdf

test_transfer_wheatstone_all_equal()[source]¶

Case where all resistors of the bridge are equal, and there is potential for these lines:

A_lattice = (Ya + Yb)*(Yd + Yc)/(Ya*Yd-Yb*Yc) B_lattice = (Ya + Yb + Yc + Yd)/(Ya*Yd-Yb*Yc)

to raise an error. Note: I made sure with a break-point that this code actually calls those two lines.

test_transfer_square_symmetrical_lattice()[source]¶

Square symmetrical lattice
